title: New: Eugene Marie – Money
body:
**Eugene Marie’s** ambitious debut track, They Scared, put them on the radar as one of Brooklyn’s finest new acts, and their second offering, _Money_, yet again showcases their addictive take on experimental pop.

Somewhere between the radio friendly energy of Sylvan Esso and the more left field genius of Grimes deep cuts, it’s the sign of a group determined not to be limited to a singular particular style. Check it out below.
